Uses of Package
com.janeirodigital.sai.core.authorization

  • Packages that use com.janeirodigital.sai.core.authorization 
    Package Description
    com.janeirodigital.sai.application
    API for client applications as defined by the Solid Application Interoperability specification.
    com.janeirodigital.sai.core.authorization
    Access to protected resources through supplied access tokens
    com.janeirodigital.sai.core.factories
    Factories used to build and get instances of most interoperability data objects
    com.janeirodigital.sai.core.http
    Factories to build and access HTTP clients used by sai-java
  • Classes in com.janeirodigital.sai.core.authorization used by com.janeirodigital.sai.application 
    Class Description
    AuthorizedSession
    Interface implemented by different types of authorized sessions, typically different types of OAuth2/OIDC flows.
    AuthorizedSessionAccessor
    Provides an interface for sai-java to lookup an AuthorizedSession based on an AccessToken or the session itself, which is necessary for applications that operate on behalf of multiple social agents.
  • Classes in com.janeirodigital.sai.core.authorization used by com.janeirodigital.sai.core.authorization 
    Class Description
    AccessToken
    General representation of an AccessToken.
    AuthorizedSession
    Interface implemented by different types of authorized sessions, typically different types of OAuth2/OIDC flows.
    AuthorizedSessionAccessor
    Provides an interface for sai-java to lookup an AuthorizedSession based on an AccessToken or the session itself, which is necessary for applications that operate on behalf of multiple social agents.
    ClientCredentialsSession
    Implementation of AuthorizedSession for a Client Credentials authorization flow
    ClientCredentialsSession.Builder
    Builder for ClientCredentialsSession instances.
    RefreshToken
    General representation of a RefreshToken.
    SolidOidcSession
    Implementation of AuthorizedSession for Solid-OIDC.
    SolidOidcSession.Builder
    Builder for SolidOidcSession instances.
  • Classes in com.janeirodigital.sai.core.authorization used by com.janeirodigital.sai.core.factories 
    Class Description
    AuthorizedSession
    Interface implemented by different types of authorized sessions, typically different types of OAuth2/OIDC flows.
  • Classes in com.janeirodigital.sai.core.authorization used by com.janeirodigital.sai.core.http 
    Class Description
    AuthorizedSessionAccessor
    Provides an interface for sai-java to lookup an AuthorizedSession based on an AccessToken or the session itself, which is necessary for applications that operate on behalf of multiple social agents.
